pkgmetadata.longdescription: Qgraf is a computer program that generates Feynman diagrams for various types of QFT models â€” it is a research tool created with the obvious aim of contributing to extend the range of feasible, perturbative QFT calculations. It generates neither 0-point nor non-connected diagrams, though. Diagrams are represented by symbolic expressions only; nevertheless, if some kind of graphical representation is required, have a look at the external links.
